testcase.name: jdk7::urandomfix RedHat on operatingsystem RedHat should contain Exec[set urandom /lib/systemd/system/rngd.service] with user => "root"
jdk7::urandomfix RedHat on operatingsystem RedHat should contain Exec[systemctl-daemon-reload] with command => "systemctl --system daemon-reload"
jdk7::urandomfix RedHat on operatingsystem RedHat should contain Service[rngd] with ensure => "running" and enable => true
